title: Platform Technology Stack Update: Latest Tools & Frameworks
description: We've updated our platform with the latest technologies and frameworks to provide the best learning experience.

content.data:
Technology Stack Update - December 2024

We're constantly evolving our platform to use the latest and greatest technologies:

Frontend Updates:
• React 18.2 with Concurrent Features
• Next.js 14 for server-side rendering
• TypeScript 5.0 for enhanced type safety
• Tailwind CSS 3.4 for modern styling
• Framer Motion for smooth animations

Backend Improvements:
• Node.js 20 LTS for better performance
• Express.js 4.18 with security enhancements
• MongoDB 7.0 with improved query performance
• Redis 7.2 for caching and session management
• GraphQL for efficient data fetching

DevOps & Infrastructure:
• Docker containers for consistent deployments
• Kubernetes for scalable orchestration
• AWS CloudFront for global CDN
• GitHub Actions for automated CI/CD
• Vercel for seamless deployments

Security Enhancements:
• OAuth 2.0 with PKCE for secure authentication
• JWT tokens with refresh mechanism
• Rate limiting and DDoS protection
• Data encryption at rest and in transit
• Regular security audits and updates

content.caption: Modern React implementation with concurrent features
